title: Chef De Piece, "Les Quatre Parties du Monde", ca. 1785
medium:
Medium: cotton plain weave
Technique:printed by engraved plate.
inscribed: Factory mark at one end in use at the Oberkampf factory between the years 1792 and 1815. Partial mark which appears to be D151.
dimensions:
Warp: 33cm (13in.). Weft: 101cm (39 3/4in.) Selvage present at right edge.
Pattern: Width of printing plate: 95.5cm (37 1/2in.)                                No height present in piece.
description: Design in blue on a white background. Deer, ostrich, monkeys, elephant and part of the figure of Asia.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chef De Piece, "Les Quatre Parties du Monde", ca. 1785.
ca. 1785. Medium: cotton plain weave
Technique:printed by engraved plate.. Gift of Cora Ginsburg. 1994-80-7.
